#summary How to add a provider programmatically
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Add a Provider using code =
The control already comes with a number of preset providers, but it also allows you to add your own custom Providers.

In this page, I will show an example of how to add 2 new Providers via code:

{{{
protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) {

    Provider directProvider = new Provider("Some custom provider", "www.providerpage.com", "images/directprovider.png");
    Provider usernameProvider = new Provider("Some custom provider", "www.providerpage.com/{u}", "images/usernameprovider.png");
    
    NETOpenIDSelector1.AddProvider(directProvider);
    NETOpenIDSelector1.AddProvider(usernameProvider);

}
}}}
